text: Citroën 2CV was a car produced by Citroën from 1949 until 1990. It was a cleverly designed basic car with a fabric roof, a soft suspension and an air cooled engine, that was designed to be cheap to buy and to run. The model is often known as the Tin Snail due to its looks. title: Citroën 2CV
